name: Master File - Staff Practitioner
description: Master file updates for healthcare staff and practitioner information including credentials, privileges, and contact data
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 8 Master Files - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Synchronize healthcare staff and practitioner master data across all clinical and administrative systems
timing: Sent when staff information changes, including new hires, terminations, credential updates, or privilege modifications
standardNotes: M02 specifically handles staff practitioner master file updates
STF segment contains core staff identification and demographic information
PRA segment contains practitioner-specific data including specialties and credentials
ORG segment provides organizational affiliation details
Critical for maintaining accurate provider directories and clinical access controls
realWorldScenarios: New physician hired and needs access to all clinical systems
Nurse practitioner receives additional certification requiring privilege updates
Physician changes contact information after office relocation
Staff member terminated and access needs to be revoked across systems
Locum physician temporary credentials activated for coverage period
Resident physician rotation requires updated department assignments

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - staff data accuracy affects patient safety, billing, and regulatory compliance
